Class Branch

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
components.Branch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hub
public class Branch
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable, Node, java.lang.Cloneable
Represents a local branch
Version:
3.0, 14/6/2021
Author:
Itzik Rahamim - 312202351, Gil Ben Hamo - 315744557

    void work()
    This function performs a work unit in each beat according to the following requirements: For each package whose status is COLLECTION, if there is a vehicle available, he goes out to collect the package. For each package whose status is DELIVERY, if there is a vehicle available, he is sent to deliver the package.

    • deliverPackage

      public void deliverPackage​(Package p)
      Remove the package from listPackages.
      If package not exist in listPackages print massage.
      Specified by:
      deliverPackage in interface Node
      Parameters:
      p - - The package we want to deliver

    • work

      public void work()
      This function performs a work unit in each beat according to the following requirements:
      • For each package whose status is COLLECTION, if there is a vehicle available, he goes out to collect the package.
      • For each package whose status is DELIVERY, if there is a vehicle available, he is sent to deliver the package.
      Specified by:
      work in interface Node
